game.name: Toastellia
game.description:
One of the latest free games for girls to play online, Toastellia is a wonderful recreational activity that will help you to show your cooking skills to the whole world. In this challenging and interesting online gaming activity, you have to manage a newly-opened toastie cafe where you will have to take and deliver the orders of your customers timely. Will you be able to keep up with all of your customers orders? Do not forget to gather new ingredients and various decoration accessories like stickers to make your dish look delicious in this simulation game.

In this popular flash game, you have to make your customers feel happy by preparing and ordering their meal on time. Check your customer orders and try to staple all the ingredients in the right order. Do not forget to toast and deliver it to your hungry customers. Making toasts in this game Toastelia will surely give you great fun. Listen to your customers orders properly before delivering them on their table. This job is not easy since the number of customers increases with each level of this cool cooking game for kids. The game includes 15 levels.  

Show your best cooking skills, and get ready to prepare some highly scrumptious toasts within the shortest possible. Every happy customer will give you some good tip through which you can easily clear the present level and move on to the advanced one of this state-of-the-art online gaming activity. One of the latest girls game, Toastellia is for teens, kids and grownups and features fabulous gameplay, easy control and high-quality graphics. The audio and video effects of this online recreational activity are also awesome.
